Description: Gold coin. Emperor and Two Sons.
Bibliographic references: BMC Oriental (Arab-Byzantine) / A catalogue of the Arab-Byzantine and post-reform Umaiyad coins (54, p.18)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.32, fig.2)
Exhibition history: Exhibition: 2022 4 Feb-22 May, Zurich, Switzerland, Museum Rietberg, In the name of the image 2018, 6 May- 30 June, National Museum, New Delhi, India and the World: A History in Nine Stories 2017-2018, 10 Nov 2017 - 18 Feb 2018, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya (CSMVS), Mumbai, India, India and the World: A History in Nine Stories 2015-2016 29 Oct–7 Feb, London, BM, G35, Egypt: faith after the pharaohs.
